job.title: Data Scientist - Data Analytics

into actionable insights This is a senior role to enhance the maturity of advanced analytics methods and coach the team across multiple PODs The Data Scientist is a knowledgeable leader with an ability to lead and is passionate about data and using machine learning to solve business problems The right candidate will haveampnbspltstronggtdeep knowledge of applying data science for forecasting customer analysis item and inventory managementltstronggtampnbspand other areas of retailltpgtltpgtWe are looking for aampnbspltstronggthighly motivated customer focused
